item.title: GD Help please
item.dc:creator: @d_sign d_sign
item.description:
@d_sign wrote:

[code]<?php
header (“Content-type: image/png”);
function writeMyName(){

srand ((double) microtime( )*1000000);
$random = rand(0,20);

$img_handle = imageCreateFromPNG(“img/rs.png”);
$text1 = $_GET[“txt1”];
$text2 = $_GET[“txt2”];
$user = $_GET[“user”];
$color = ImageColorAllocate ($img_handle, 100, 100, 100);

ImageString ($img_handle, 3, 10, 9, $text1, $color);
$outfile= “test/$random.png”;
ImagePng ($img_handle,$outfile);
ImageDestroy ($img_handle);
}
echo $outfile;
echo “”;
?>[/code]
Says it contains errors
So what shoudl I do to fix that? I want to display the Image URL AND the Image at the same time

Read full topic
